# ğŸŒŸ Contributing to Smart Resume AI

Thank you for your interest in contributing to **Smart Resume AI**!  
This project is developed by **Shashi Kumar** as a part of the B.Tech CSE curriculum at CGC Jhanjeri.  

Contributions are welcome, especially if you want to help improve:

- Resume analysis features
- AI-based suggestions
- Resume builder templates
- Documentation and examples

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ How to Contribute

1. **Fork the Repository** (Optional for personal experimentation)
2. **Clone the Repository**:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/shashi00013/Smart-AI-Resume-Analyzer.git
cd Smart-AI-Resume-Analyzer
Create a Branch for your feature or fix:

git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name
Make Changes and test them locally

Commit your changes with descriptive messages

Push your branch and create a Pull Request (if collaborating)

ğŸ’¡ Guidelines
Code: Keep it clean, simple, and readable

Documentation: Update README or guides when adding features

Ethics: Use AI responsibly; avoid using sensitive data

ğŸ“¬ Reporting Issues
If you encounter any bug or problem, you can report it via GitHub Issues or email:

Developer: Shashi Kumar
Email: sk5251476@gmail.com

This is an academic project. Contributions are mainly for learning purposes.
